name: The Lonely Realm of the Space WIzard
name_original: The Lonely Realm of the Space WIzard
description:
You are Tom Thaum, a wizard that lives on a lonely planetoid in space. A sudden meteor storm has destroyed your tower, the center of your power. Can you rebuild it in time to save your tiny home planet?

If you like this game and would like to see it developed further, vote for it @ Ludum Dare: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=p...

Crunchpickle Games: http://www.crunchpickle.com
